query:
SELECT f.id, f.date, t1.name as home_team, t2.name as away_team, l.name as league
FROM fixtures f
JOIN teams t1 ON f.homeTeamId = t1.id
JOIN teams t2 ON f.awayTeamId = t2.id
JOIN leagues l ON f.leagueId = l.id
WHERE DATE(f.date) = '2026-02-02'
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 19iLEYK5xVcJkRu.root --database iPoAWkYDjVf6EgjC7ZwEhi --execute SELECT f.id, f.date, t1.name as home_team, t2.name as away_team, l.name as league
FROM fixtures f
JOIN teams t1 ON f.homeTeamId = t1.id
JOIN teams t2 ON f.awayTeamId = t2.id
JOIN leagues l ON f.leagueId = l.id
WHERE DATE(f.date) = '2026-02-02'
LIMIT 10;
